analyzed: bhūmikā
śrīmate bhagavat rāmānujāya namaḥ
śrīmate nigama anta mahā deśikāya namaḥ

original: prabandharatnamidaṃ jayati jīvitamiva nyāyavistarasya vidyāsthānasya śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivarakṣuṇṇavartmano
analyzed: prabandha ratnam idam jayati jīvitam iva nyāya vistarasya vidyā sthānasya
brahma mīmāṃsā śāstrasya ca

original: anupajīvya cedaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ ko vibhavaḥ sapanditumapi śeṣasya vidyāsthānajātasya ? /
analyzed: an upajīvya ca idam vidyā sthānam kaḥ vibhavaḥ sapanditum api śeṣasya vidyā sthāna jātasya

original: sarvameva hi loke śrutaṃ saṃśayaviparyayābhyāmāhitapāriplavaṃ vātyāspṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaśakalaṃ na kathañcidapi pratitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: sarvam eva hi loke śrutam saṃśaya viparyayābhyām āhita pāriplavam vā ati āspṛṣṭam iva tṛṇa śakalam na kathañcid api pratitiṣṭhati

original: pramāṇaparīkṣayā tu yathāvadupapāditayā dṛṣadeva vyapoḍhavikṣobhaṃ niṣkampamavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: pramāṇa parīkṣayā tu yathāvat upapāditayā dṛṣadā iva vyapoḍha vikṣobham niṣkampam avatiṣṭhate
pramāṇa parīkṣā eva ca prathama avatāra padavī nyāya vistarasya

original: padavākyapramāṇabhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstraṃ śāstravidaḥ /
analyzed: pada vākya pramāṇa bhedena hi tredhā vibhajanti śāstram śāstra vidaḥ
tatra tadam nāma śabda anuśāsanam pāṇini ādi praṇītam
vākyam ca vicāra pūrvaka śrauta vākya artha nirṇaya rūpam karma brahma ātmaka viṣaya vibhāga vibhaktam ubhayam mīmāsā śāstram

original: pramāṇaṃ tu---kvacidapyartheṣvanavagāḍhāvaṣṭambhāṃ svātmanyapyanupajātavisrambhāṃ ḍolāyamānāṃ buddhiṃ kareṇumiva tarkaśṛṅkhalābhirālānayanmananavyapadeśaṃ  #
analyzed: pramāṇam tu kvacid api artheṣu an avagāḍha avaṣṭambhām sva ātmani api an upajāta visrambhām dolāyamānām buddhim kareṇum iva tarka śṛṅkhalābhiḥ ālānayat manana vyapadeśam
śāstram
yasya saṃjñā antaram nyāya vistaraḥ tarka śāstram ityādi

original: tadetat pramāṇapradhānamapi pramāṇagateḥ prameyasvarūpavivecanaparyavasānatayā prameyepi nyastapadaṃ pravṛttam /
analyzed: tat etat pramāṇa pradhānam api pramāṇa gateḥ prameya svarūpa vivecana paryavasāna tayā prameye api nyasta padam pravṛttam
itaretara visaṃvāda saṃrabdha uddhuraiḥ āstikaiḥ nāstikaiḥ ca bahudhā vādibhiḥ sva svacchanda anurodhena anyathā

original: cānyathā ca prameyaṃ pratipadyamānairitastataḥ parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇānyapi parāvṛttarūpatayā
analyzed: ca anyathā ca prameyam pratipadyamānaiḥ itas tatas parikṛṣyamāṇāni pramāṇāni api parāvṛtta rūpa tayā
lakṣaṇataḥ durgrahāṇi abhūvan

original: mānābhāsavyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum /
analyzed: māna ābhāsa vyāmiśrāṇi hi mānāni na sukarāṇi vivektum

original: tadevaṃ śāstrameva paṅkilīkṛtaṃ cakṣuriva timiropasṛṣṭaṃ vigalitārthagrahaṇāpāṭava saṃvṛttam /
analyzed: tat evam śāstram eva paṅkilīkṛtam cakṣuḥ iva timira upasṛṣṭam vigalita artha grahaṇa āpāṭava saṃvṛttam
aviparyasta lakṣaṇam pramāṇa vargam parigṛhṇādbhiḥ api saugata ārhata kāpila cārvāka jaiminīya ādibhiḥ aṅgeṣu avāntarabhedeṣu
ca nyūna atirekam āsthitaiḥ anekadhā upayogāt anekāntīkṛta matayaḥ kṛtamatayaḥ api sva sva upadeśa pāramparī pratyayāt ekatamam
pakṣam abhimanyamānāḥ sparigraha avasāda kātara tayā pakṣa antareṣu sa abhyasūyāḥ cirāya api
garu kuleṣu pariśramya ālabdha buddhi prasādāḥ vibhrāmyantaḥ eva anubhūyante

original: ataḥ sarvopayogāya doṣaguṇahānopādānābhyāṃ śikṣaṇīyasyāsya nyāyavistarasya pṛthakprasthānaṃ nyāyadarśanaṃ nāma sūtrajātaṃ gautamena muninā  #
analyzed: atas sarva upayogāya doṣa guṇa hāna upādānābhyām śikṣaṇīyasya asya nyāya vistarasya pṛthak prasthānam nyāyadarśanam nāma sūtra jātam gautamena muninā
prathamam praṇītam

original: yatra pramāṇāpramāṇādivivecanayā tattvanirṇayopāyāstatra ca saṃbhavanto guṇadoṣāḥ kathāsu ca grāhyāparihāryavibhāgāḥ saviśeṣaṃ pradarśitāḥ
analyzed: yatra pramāṇa apramāṇa ādi vivecanayā tattva nirṇaya upāyāḥ tatra ca saṃbhavantaḥ guṇa doṣāḥ kathāsu ca grāhya aparihārya vibhāgāḥ sa viśeṣam pradarśitāḥ

original: tacca nyāyadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ pramāṇaprameyādisūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tatparīkṣaṇena caritārthama /
analyzed: tat ca nyāya darśanam prathamam pramāṇa prameya ādi sūtreṇa ṣoḍaśadhā padārthān vibhajya tad parīkṣaṇena caritārtham
tatra prameya tvasya kevala anvayinaḥ sarva padārtha sādhāraṇa tayā vibhājaka tvam anupapadyamānam

original: manyamānena kaṇādena muninā kṛtsnameva prameyajātaṃ dravyādisaptapadārthaparisaṃkhyānenāsaṃkīrṇaṃ vibhaktam /
analyzed: manyamānena kaṇādena muninā kṛtsnam eva prameya jātam dravya ādi sapta padārtha parisaṃkhyānena asaṃkīrṇam vibhaktam

original: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyābhāvān vitathamevāpadārthān padārthayatā tathāvidhameva
analyzed: tatra ca sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya abhāvān vitatham eva a padārthān padārthayatā tathāvidham eva

original: cānyadanyadālapatā grāhyamagṛhṇatā tyājyaṃ cātyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūramapathīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: ca anyat anyat ālapatā grāhyam a gṛhṇatā tyājyam ca a tyajatā kaṇabhakṣeṇa dūram apathīkṛtaḥ

original: śāstrapatha iti brahmasūtrakārādibhiḥ pratikṣipto vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: śāstra pathaḥ iti brahmasūtra kāra ādibhiḥ pratikṣiptaḥ vaiśeṣikaḥ pakṣaḥ
nyāya pakṣaḥ tu śaṅkyamāna upasargaḥ api kathañcid vyākhyāna ādheya saṃskāra tayā na atyartha parivarjanīyaḥ

original: iti manyamānāḥ katipayasaṃskārasaṃskṛtamimaṃ pakṣaṃ parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ
analyzed: iti manyamānāḥ katipaya saṃskāra saṃskṛtam imam pakṣam parigṛhya nibandhān nibabandhuḥ
pūrve kecid ācāryāḥ

original: te ca nibandhā eṣu divaseṣu nāmnaiva kevalamavaśiṣyantotadyathā--śrīmannāthamunimiśrapraṇītaṃ nyāyatattvam,
analyzed: te ca nibandhāḥ eṣu divaseṣu nāmnā eva kevalam avaśiṣyante tat yathā śrīmat nātha muni miśra praṇītam nyāyatattvam

original: śrībhagavadyāmunācāryāṇāmācāryaiḥ śrīmannāthamunicaraṇāśrayāṇāṃ śrīpuṇḍarīkākṣāṇāṃ śiṣyaiśca śrīrāmamiśragurubhirviracitaṃ vivaraṇaṃ ṣaḍarthasaṃkṣepaśceti
analyzed: śrī bhagavat yāmuna ācāryāṇām ācāryaiḥ śrīmat nātha muni caraṇa āśrayāṇām śrī puṇḍarīkākṣāṇām śiṣyaiḥ ca śrī rāma miśra gurubhiḥ viracitam vivaraṇam ṣaḍartha saṃkṣepaḥ ca iti
a vidita prabandhṛ vyapadeśam nyāya su darśanam prajñā paritrāṇām ca iti prabandha yugalam
śrīmat nārāyaṇa muni viracita tvena ācārya upāttam nāmnā ca anuddiṣṭam kim api prabandha ratnam

original: asyaiva ca nyāyapariśuddhipraṇeturācāryasyācāryeṇa mātulena ca vādihaṃsāmbuvāhaḥ
analyzed: asya eva ca nyāya pariśuddhi praṇetuḥ ācāryasya ācāryeṇa mātulena ca vādi haṃsa ambuvāhaḥ
iti praśasti nāma aṅkitena ātreya rāmānuja ācāryeṇa kṛtam sva pratibhā draviṇa nikṣepāyamāṇam

original: nyāyakuliśābhidhānaṃ cetyete nibandhāḥ nyāyapariśuddhikṛtaivācāryeṇa tatra tatra
analyzed: nyāyakuliśa abhidhānam ca iti ete nibandhāḥ nyāyapariśuddhi kṛtā eva ācāryeṇa tatra tatra
bhūyiṣṭham udāhriyante

original: yadeva yāvadeva cācāryeṇa kvacit kvacidudāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vākyakhaṇḍaṃ vā,
analyzed: yat eva yāvat eva ca ācāryeṇa kvacid kvacid udāhṛtam vākyam vākyakhaṇḍam vā
tad atiriktam kiyat api ṭīkākṛtām api dṛṣṭi viṣayībhūtam nā upalabhyate
ayam atra hetuḥ pratibhāti ācārya saṃnihita kāleṣu api anatisaṃkṣepa vistara ramaṇīyāni
prasphuṭa arthāni nitya prakāśāni ācārya śrī sūkti ratnāni avamṛśya rasa āsvāda vādi vijaya śiṣya pravacana adri pravaṇeṣu
upari upari vyākhyāna ādi praṇayanaiḥ a vistṛtya śāstram vitatham eva atipātita kāleṣu śiṣya praśiṣya vargeṣu
kumāra vedānta ācārya ādiṣu

original: atīte ca gaṇarātre kaiścidarvācīnairāvirbhūtairgranthakṛdbhirajñātapūrvavṛttāntairyathākathañcidvyākhyānena kaścidupakāraḥ kṛta iti //
analyzed: atīte ca gaṇarātre kaiścid arvācīnaiḥ āvirbhūtaiḥ granthakṛdbhiḥ ajñāta pūrva vṛttāntaiḥ yathā kathañcid vyākhyānena kaścid upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ iti
hanta niḥśeṣa kṣālita akhila kalaṅkasya api asya śrī bhagavat rāmānuja siddhāntasya idam ekam śocanīyam vaiśasam
yat tāvat ācārya pada abhiṣiktaiḥ api arvācīnaiḥ budha varaiḥ kāṇāda gautamīya ādi sāmānya śāstra pariśrameṇa
vyayita vayobhiḥ antime vayasi kathañcid upajāta vedānta tṛṣṇaiḥ śiṣya saṃgrahaṇa kṛtakṣaṇaiḥ avaśya upādeya upadeśa śrī bhāṣya ādi katipaya grantha grahaṇa caritārthaiḥ an ādṛtāḥ

original: prācāmācāryāṇāṃ vāgvistarā etarhi śrotumapi durlabhatāṃ gamitārḥ /
analyzed: prācām ācāryāṇām vāc vistarāḥ etarhi śrotum api durlabha tām gamitārḥ

original: idṛśoyaṃ vidyāvadhaḥ kasya vā vidyāvyasanino na dūnoti mānasam ? /
analyzed: idṛśaḥ yam vidyā vadhaḥ kasya vā vidyā vyasaninaḥ na dūnoti mānasam
athavā kṛtam prācām prabandha praṇāśa cintanena

original: asyaivācāryasya vāṅmadhuniṣyando mudhaiva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ /
analyzed: asya eva ācāryasya vāc madhu nisyandaḥ mudhā eva kiyān na visraṃsitaḥ
sarva tantra svatantrāṇām ācārya caraṇānām śata adhikāḥ prabandhāḥ hāra vimalāḥ prasiddhāḥ
saṃskṛta prākṛta drāviḍa bhāṣā bhistra rauśikāni kāvya nāṭaka stotrāṇi
loka śāstra vyavahāra nirūḍha saṃskṛta vyatikīrṇa drāviḍa bhāṣā mayāni ca caturtha rāśi niviṣṭāni laukikānām api anugrāhakāni
parīkṣakāṇām api sugraha sāṃpradāyika tattva hita puruṣa arthāni ādarśa vimalāni maṇi pravāla śabditāni

original: niyataśrāvyatayā rahasyasaṃjñitāni siddhāntaniṣkarṣaṇedaṃparāṇi lokaśreyase jātāni granthajātāni /
analyzed: niyata śrāvya tayā rahasya saṃjñitāni siddhānta niṣkarṣaṇa idaṃparāṇi loka śreyase jātāni grantha jātāni

original: tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrībhagavadrāmānujamunivaraviracitasya śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyasya
analyzed: tatra vedānte tāvat tattvaṭīkā nāma śrī bhagavat rāmānuja muni vara viracitasya śārīraka mīmāṃsā bhāṣyasya
vivṛtiḥ apūrva artha viśeṣa vinyāsa paribhūṣitā traikālya saṃbhāvanīyānām aśeṣa ākṣepāṇām acala niścayān
parihārān upadarśayantī gaṅgena gaurī guroḥ etasmāt ācārya varyāt āvirbhūtā

original: sā ca prathamasūtramātramapi yāvadasamagropalabdhapracārā vedāntavidyāvicārakāṅkṣiṇāṃ cintāvyasanāyaiva khaṇḍabhūtā paridṛśyate /
analyzed: sā ca prathama sūtra mātram api yāvat asamagra upalabdha pracārā vedānta vidyā vicāra kāṅkṣiṇām cintā vyasanāya eva khaṇḍa bhūtā paridṛśyate

original: vicitrāyodhanākuṇṭhaśaktau tejasvini svāṃ śakti samagramadarśayitvaiva niyatiyaiyātyenākasmāduparataṃ yodharatne taṭasthadṛṣṭe kasya vā vīradharmamanutiṣṭhato  #
analyzed: vicitra āyodhana akuṇṭha śaktau tejasvini svām śakti samagram a darśayitvā eva niyati yaiyātyena akasmāt uparatam yodha ratne taṭastha dṛṣṭe kasya vā vīra dharmam anutiṣṭhataḥ
hṛdayam na dūyeta
saḥ yam asya nibandha ratnasya lope dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: kecinmanyeran ācāryaireva na samāpūritāyaṃ grantha iti,
analyzed: kecid manyeran ācāryaiḥ eva na samāpūritā ayam granthaḥ iti

original: tadetat svopamānena sarvatra śaktiparicchedaṃ kalayatāṃ pralapitamatra na kramate /
analyzed: tat etat sva upamānena sarvatra śakti paricchedam kalayatām pralapitam atra na kramate

original: trividhāḥ khalu loke prabandhakṛtaḥ---kecidgurukulacirapariśramairanekaśaḥ śrutān yathāśrutamarthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayanto lokamanugṛhṇanti
analyzed: trividhāḥ khalu loke prabandha kṛtaḥ kecid guru kula cira pariśramaiḥ anekaśas śrutān yathāśrutam arthān patreṣu viniveśya prakāśayantaḥ lokam anugṛhṇanti
atha itare ye punar jātyā eva sphaṭika avadāta buddhayaḥ sattva viśeṣa āvirbhāva nistuṣa āśayāḥ
svatas sva anta mukura tala sphuṭa saṃkrānta sarva artha praticchandāḥ api saṃpradāya parirakṣaṇa śraddhalu tayā
guru upadeśa darśitām padavīm a varjayantaḥ citta ghaṇṭā patheṣu sama samaya saṃcarat akhila pramāṇa tarka guru upadeśa saṃpradāya viśeṣā
eka helayā bhūyasaḥ ṛthān ayatnena grahītum praṇetum api arhanti

original: anye tu nirantarabhajanakṛtaprasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūrapratyūḍhapratyūhavipruṣo
analyzed: anye tu nirantara bhajana kṛta prasadanena bhagavatā sarveśvareṇa dūra pratyūḍha pratyūha vipruṣaḥ
niḥśreyasa avadhīni kuśala jātāni anubhavitum nija caraṇa śaraṇān api anubhāvayitum ca akuṇṭha śaktayaḥ tṛtīya kakṣyā niviṣṭāḥ
te ete vyāsa parāśara vālmīki pramukhaiḥ mahā ṛṣi gaṇaiḥ api gaṇanīya anubhāvāḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ prabandha kṛtaḥ

original: yeṣāmekapratibhāsūtrasyūtāni prameyaratnāni punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlitānyapi navanavānīva
analyzed: yeṣām eka pratibhā sūtra syūtāni prameya ratnāni punar punar pariśīlitāni api nava navāni iva

original: prajñāvatāṃ hṛdayeṣu kamapi camatkāramāvahanti na ca kadācit purāṇacitravad vicchāyāni bhavanti /
analyzed: prajñāvatām hṛdayeṣu kam api camatkāram āvahanti na ca kadācid purāṇa citra vat vicchāyāni bhavanti

original: nyāpariśuddhikṛdācāryastu dvitīyatṛtīyayorubhayorapri kakṣyayoḥ hārāvalyoriva nāyakamaṇiḥ prakāśata iti tattvavidāmaparokṣam /
analyzed: nyā pariśuddhi kṛt ācāryaḥ tu dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ ubhayoḥ apri kakṣyayoḥ hāra āvalyoḥ iva nāyaka maṇiḥ prakāśate iti tattva vidām aparokṣam
prakṛti siddham ca prakrāntasya anta gamanam śaktimatām
loka anugraha mātra phalāḥ yeṣām sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ
tādṛśānām ayatna nirvartanīye loka upakāra arthe samārambhe cikīrṣita vicchedaḥ katham upapadyate

original: evaṅguṇena cācāryacūḍāmaṇipavanā śiṣyabuddhiṃ prasādayitumārabdhā kṛtirasamāpya madhye apaviddhā bhavatīti ko nukhalu prabhāvavedī pratipattumarhati
analyzed: evaṅguṇena ca ācārya cūḍāmaṇi pavanā śiṣya buddhim prasādayitum ārabdhā kṛtiḥ a samāpya madhye apaviddhā bhavati iti kaḥ nu khalu prabhāva vedī pratipattum arhati
api ca nikhila nigama śreṇī cūḍā pariṣkṛti rūpiṇī nipuṇa manasām āśā saudha sthalīṣu nibadhyate
yati pati bhuvaḥ bhāṣyasya asau pravacana vidhau aṣṭāviṃśe jayadhvaja paṭṭikā

original: iti svakṛtasya bhāṣyapravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyāmāvṛttau tattvaṭīkānibandhapraṇayanamācāryastattvaṭīkāprārambhe svayameva spaṣṭamāha /
analyzed: iti sva kṛtasya bhāṣya pravacanasya aṣṭāviṃśyām āvṛttau tattva ṭīkā nibandha praṇayanam ācāryaḥ tattva ṭīkā prārambhe svayam eva spaṣṭam āha
saṃkalpasūrya udaya prastāvanāyām ca viṃśati abde viśruta nānāvidha vidyaḥ triṃśat vāram śrāvita śārīraka bhāṣyaḥ

original: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śrutipathyaṃ nāthaprītyai nāṭakamarthyaṃ vyadhitaitat” //
analyzed: śreyaḥ śrīmān veṅkaṭanāthaḥ śruti pathyam nātha prītyai nāṭakam arthyam vyadhita etat

original: iti sūtradhāravācā śārīrakabhāṣyapravacanaṃ saṃkalpasūryodayanirmāṇakāle triṃśadvārakṛtaṃ prathayati /
analyzed: iti sūtradhāra vācā śārīraka bhāṣya pravacanam saṃkalpasūrya udaya nirmāṇa kāle triṃśat vāra kṛtam prathayati
tadānīm eva triṃśat vāram śārīraka bhāṣya pravacanam āsīt yadi

original: tataḥ paścāt pravacanāvṛttayastatopi hi bhūyasyo bhavitumarhanti /
analyzed: tatas paścāt pravacana āvṛttayaḥ tatas api hi bhūyasyaḥ bhavitum arhanti
kṛṣṇa miśra samāgama kālaḥ hi saṃkalpa sūrya udaya nirmāṇa samayaḥ
tatas ca aṣṭāviṃśyām āvṛttau tattva ṭīkā nirmāṇam kṛṣṇa miśra samāgamāt pūrvataram bhavati

original: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaraṃ tattvaṭīkā kṛteti ca pratīyate /
analyzed: śatadūṣaṇyāḥ samanantaram tattvaṭīkā kṛtā iti ca pratīyate

original: uktaṃ hi svayamevācāryaistattvaṭīkāṃ prakramamāṇaiḥ--- “śātitaḥ śatadūṣaṇyāṃ śaṅkarādimudhāgrahaḥ /
analyzed: uktam hi svayam eva ācāryaiḥ tattva ṭīkām prakramamāṇaiḥ śātitaḥ śatadūṣaṇyām śaṅkara ādi mudhāgrahaḥ
śarīraka śarīram tu vyaktam atra pradarśyate
iti
śruta prakāśikā bhūmau yena ādau parirakṣitā

original: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam //
analyzed: pravartitā ca pātreṣu tasmai śreṣṭhāya maṅgalam
iti kumāra vedānta ācārya kṛta maṅgalāśāsana parāmarśane śruta prakāśikā pravacana tatpara tvam ācāryāṇām tattva ṭīkā pūraṇa vighātāya jātam syāt iti ca āpāta ramaṇīyam
śru prakāśika ācāryasya hi mleccha bala upamarda lagnasya nija guru sabrahmacāriṇaḥ mumūrṣataḥ
prārthanayā tad grantha rakṣaṇa pravacanayoḥ aṅgīkāre pi na etāvatā svakīyam mahīyāṃsam
prabandha praṇayana prayatnam ācāryaḥ vitathīkariṣyati
na hma atratyam apūrvam artha jātam grantha antareṇa caritārtham bhavati
tat idam ācārya granthe kṛta śramāṇām svatas eva su vyaktam
idānīm upalabhyamāna paryante api tattva ṭīkā grantha khaṇḍe ye viṣayāḥ pratipādyantu

original: naite śrutaprakāśikāyāmanyatra vā granthāntare pratipattuṃ sulabhāḥ /
analyzed: na ete śrutaprakāśikāyām anyatra vā grantha antare pratipattum sulabhāḥ

original: kiñca svācāryairvādihaṃsāmbuvāhāryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāna eva hi nyāyakuliśākhye nyāyanibandharatne nyāyapariśuddhimācāryaḥ svayaṃ nibabandha
analyzed: kiñca sva ācāryaiḥ vādi haṃsa ambuvāha āryaiḥ praṇīte vidyamāne eva hi nyāyakuliśa ākhye nyāya nibandha ratne nyāya pariśuddhim ācāryaḥ svayam nibabandha

original: avaśyavaktavyeṣu cārtheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcidapi śāsrācāryatāyāḥ sadṛśo na bhavati /
analyzed: avaśya vaktavyeṣu ca artheṣu joṣaṃbhāvaḥ kathañcid api śāsra ācārya tāyāḥ sadṛśaḥ na bhavati
na ca nava nava artha āviṣkaraṇam arvācām prācīna ācārya paribhavāya
api ca nikhila nigama śreṇī cūḍā pariṣkṛti rūpiṇī nipuṇa manasām āśā saudha sthalīṣu nibadhyate
iti prabandha upakrama pratijñānam eva pradarśayati grantha antaraiḥ acarita arthasya sarva vedānta artha saṃskārasya

original: mahāmatibhirapi sarvajñasakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādanārthamapūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambha iti /
analyzed: mahāmatibhiḥ api sarvajña sakāśāt śuśrūṣitasya pratipādana artham apūrvāyāḥ kṛteḥ samārambhaḥ iti
sa katham na paripūryeta

original: kiñca nijanibandhasya śrutaprakāśikārakṣaṇāṅgīkārasamaya eva labdhaprasaratāmanusmṛtya parakīyagranthapravacanamaṅgīkṛtamācāryairiti śakyamabhyūhitum
analyzed: kiñca nija nibandhasya śrutaprakāśikā rakṣaṇa aṅgīkāra samaye eva labdha prasara tām anusmṛtya parakīya grantha pravacanam aṅgīkṛtam ācāryaiḥ iti śakyam abhyūhitum
tathā ca sati tattva ṭīkā grantha lopa nidānam arvācām ācāryāṇām tatra apariśīlanam eva
na tu grantha a parisamāptiḥ

original: yathāhi nyāyasiddhāñjanamapi jaḍadravyaparicche denaiva paryavasitaṃ sāṃprataṃ paridṛśyate,
analyzed: yathā hi nyāya siddhāñjanam api jaḍa dravya paricchedena eva paryavasitam sāṃpratam paridṛśyate
adravya paricchedaḥ tu patitaḥ eva
aśakyam ca tat pūraṇam anyaiḥ

original: itthamamumarthaṃ śrīraṅgarāmānujagurureva nyāyasiddhāñjanavyākhyāne “na kvāpyataḥ paramadṛsyata kośaśeṣa- staccheṣapūraṇakṛtiḥ parihāsahetuḥ
analyzed: ittham amum artham śrī raṅgarāma anuja guruḥ eva nyāyasiddhāñjana vyākhyāne na kvāpi atas param adṛsyata kośa śeṣaḥ stad śeṣa pūraṇa kṛtiḥ parihāsa hetuḥ

original: jñātavyamanyadapi tairniraṇāyi samya- ggranthāntareṣviti na kiñcidihāsti cintyam” //
analyzed: jñātavyam anyat api taiḥ niraṇāyi samyak grantha antareṣu iti na kiñcid iha asti cintyam
iti nigamayan nivedayati
śata dūṣaṇī api hi na samagrā dṛśyate
ṣaṭṣaṣṭiḥ eva vādāḥ loke pracaranti

original: śeṣe tu mithyaiva kimapyaitihyaṃ kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti /
analyzed: śeṣe tu mithyā eva kim api aitihyam kalpayitvā katipaye prajalpanti

original: yattāvat dvaitamatakhaṇḍanaparaḥ śeṣo granthaḥ madhvamatasthena kenacidyatinā bhikṣāmaṭatā savinayamupasṛtya prārthitoyamācāryaḥ taṃ tasya
analyzed: yat tāvat dvaita mata khaṇḍana paraḥ śeṣaḥ granthaḥ madhvamata sthena kenacid yatinā bhikṣām aṭatā sa vinayam upasṛtya prārthitaḥ yam ācāryaḥ tam tasya
tat api na vicāra kṣamam
na hi ācārya grantheṣu kvacid api madhva matam nirasyate
tattva viplava abhāvāt
avāntareṣu ca artheṣu naiyāyika vaiśeṣika ādi pratipāditasya eva dvaitasya anuvādāt
an ati pracura tayā tasya matasya loka viplava prasaṃga abhāvāt ca anāsthā eva ācāryāṇām tatra syāt
atas catustriṃśat vādāḥ madhvamata khaṇḍana parāḥ iti kiṃvadantī mātram etat

original: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkādikṛtasūtravyākhyānādinirāsārthameva pravṛtteti ca tadgranthamukha eva sphuṭībhavati /
analyzed: śatadūṣaṇī ca śaṅkā ādi kṛta sūtra vyākhyāna ādi nirāsa artham eva pravṛttā iti ca tad grantha mukhe eva sphuṭībhavati

original: tatra hi ---- “prācīmupetya padavīṃ yatirājadṛṣṭāṃ tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hi prācīm upetya padavīm yati rāja dṛṣṭām tad saṃnikṛṣṭam api vā matam āśrayantaḥ

original: prājñā yathoditamidaṃ śukavat paṭhantaḥ pracchannabauddhavijaye parito yatadhvam” //
analyzed: prājñāḥ yathā uditam idam śuka vat paṭhantaḥ pracchanna bauddha vijaye paritas yatadhvam
iti pratiśrutam

original: atra 'tatsaṃnikṛṣṭamapi vā matamāśrayantaḥ' ityanena dvaitinaḥ svapakṣīkriyante /
analyzed: atra      api
advaita khaṇḍanam eva ca grantha pravṛtti prayojanam iti ca darśitam

original: tathā ca---vidyāraṇyākṣobhyamunivivāde nirṇayaṃ bruvadbhirācāryeḥ “asinā tattvamasinā parajīvaprabhedinā /
analyzed: tathā ca vidyā araṇya akṣobhya muni vivāde nirṇayam bruvadbhiḥ ācāryeḥ asinā tattvam asinā para jīva prabhedinā
vidyāraṇya mahā araṇyam akṣobhya muniḥ acchinat
iti uktam

original: ' ityatra tu śaṅkarādītyādipadaṃ yādavabhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāyeti sthitam /
analyzed: iti atra tu śaṅkara ādi ityādi padam yādava bhāskarayoḥ saṃgrahāya iti sthitam
tasmāt samagra grantha adarśanam arvācām ācāryāṇām pravacana viccheda nibandhanam prabandha lopa hetuḥ iti spaṣṭam etat
atra prasakta anuprasaktam ācāryasya kṛṣṇamiśra samāgama caritam kiñcid upanyasyate -

original: hi gauḍadeśīyaḥ paṇḍitacūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca saviśeṣakṛtaśramaḥ kaviśca
analyzed: hi gauḍa deśīyaḥ paṇḍita cūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca sa viśeṣa kṛta śramaḥ kaviḥ ca

original: brahmādvaitaṃ siddhantamātiṣṭhamāno vādakutūhalitayā sarvā diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī
analyzed: brahma advaitam siddhantam ātiṣṭhamānaḥ vāda kutūhali tayā sarvāḥ diśaḥ paryaṭan jitakāśī
krameṇa dakṣiṇān diśam ācakrāma

original: tatra śrīraṅgaṃ divyakṣetraṃ viduṣāmāvāsamākarṇya devasevāpadeśena vādasamaramarthayamānaḥ śrīraṅgarājasya bhavagataḥ prāsādamāsadāda /
analyzed: tatra śrīraṅgam divya kṣetram viduṣām āvāsam ākarṇya deva sevā apadeśena vāda samaram arthayamānaḥ śrī raṅga rājasya bhava gataḥ prāsādam āsadāda

original: tadānīṃ tatra bhāṣāmayīrgāthāḥ sarāgatālaṃ gīyamānā niśamya tatkartṝṇāṃ ca kavīnāṃ
analyzed: tadānīm tatra bhāṣā mayīḥ gāthāḥ sa rāga tālam gīyamānāḥ niśamya tad kartṝṇām ca kavīnām

original: varṇāvarāṇāmapi pratimāstasmin devālaye devopacārairārādhyamānā viditvā tatra sevāsamavetān
analyzed: varṇa avarāṇām api pratimāḥ tasmin devālaye deva upacāraiḥ ārādhyamānāḥ viditvā tatra sevā samavetān
jñāna vṛddhān śrīvaiṣṇavān āmantrya abhoḥ prājñāḥ

original: bhavatāmanenāpabhraṃśapāṭhena varṇāvarapūjanena ca dūrāpoḍhaṃ veṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ /
analyzed: bhavatām anena apabhraṃśa pāṭhena varṇa avara pūjanena ca dūra apoḍham veṣṇavam tejaḥ
kim anena ārādhanena

original: anthathākṛtamakṛtaṃ hi bhavati' iti sākṣepaṃ papraccha /
analyzed: anthathā kṛtam akṛtam hi bhavati iti sa ākṣepam papraccha
yadā taiḥ militaiḥ api na kiñcid ākṣepa sadṛśam uttaram pratipannam
tadā tadātanāya tad deśa adhipataye tam artham āvedya

original: pratiṣṭhāprabhṛti sarva evālayasaṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagra eva iti ca niyamya taṃ divyālayaṃ gāḍhaghaṭitārgaladvāraṃ parityaktāśeṣapūjotsavaṃ  #
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā prabhṛti sarvaḥ eva ālaya saṃskāraḥ kāryaḥ pratyagraḥ eva iti ca niyamya tam divya ālayam gāḍha ghaṭita argala dvāram parityakta aśeṣa pūjā utsavam
ca kārayāmāsa
loka ācārya prabhṛtayaḥ ca bahavaḥ tatra darśana guravaḥ tādṛśam vaiśasam a cintita upanatam anusmṛtya

original: durante duḥkhasāgare nimagnāstaṃ ca prativādinaṃ sarvavidyāviśāradaṃ vādāhavanavaśūramaprakampyamākalayantaḥ
analyzed: durante duḥkha sāgare nimagnāḥ tam ca prativādinam sarva vidyā viśāradam vāda āhava nava śūram aprakampyam ākalayantaḥ

original: sabhāmabhinavāṃ kāmapi saṃgamayya tasyānarthasya kiñcidapi pratividhānaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ /
analyzed: sabhām abhinavām kām api saṃgamayya tasya anarthasya kiñcid api pratividhānam cintayāmāsuḥ

original: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣāṃ saṃpradāyācāryaḥ śrīmān lokācāryaḥ sarveṣāṃ sabhāsadāmavadheyavacanaḥ samarthāmabhyarhitāṃ vācamādade--- “bhoḥ
analyzed: tasmin mahati sadasi viduṣām saṃpradāya ācāryaḥ śrīmān loka ācāryaḥ sarveṣām sabhāsadām avadheya vacanaḥ samarthām abhyarhitām vācam ādade bhoḥ

original: balavantaṃ paripanthinaṃ parāṅmukhīkartumupāyaḥ kaścidatra me pratibhāti /
analyzed: balavantam paripanthinam parāṅmukhīkartum upāyaḥ kaścid atra me pratibhāti
sa tāvat ucyamānaḥ bhavadbhiḥ anumanyatām

original: asti kila kāñcyāṃ nagaryāṃ veṅkaṭanāthāryo nāma viduṣāṃ prathamaḥ /
analyzed: asti kila kāñcyām nagaryām veṅkaṭanātha āryaḥ nāma viduṣām prathamaḥ

original: sa hi vṛṣaśailanāthasya ghaṇṭāṃśa evāvatīrṇaḥ iti tattvavidāṃ grahaṇam /
analyzed: sa hi vṛṣaśaila nāthasya ghaṇṭā aṃśe eva avatīrṇaḥ iti tattva vidām grahaṇam

original: soyaṃ pañcavarṣadeśīyaḥ śiśureva san nijamātulena vādihaṃsāmbuvāhenātreyarāmānujācāryeṇa
analyzed: saḥ ayam pañca varṣa deśīyaḥ śiśuḥ eva san nija mātulena vādi haṃsa ambuvāhena ātreya rāmānuja ācāryeṇa

original: śārīrakabhāṣyagrahaṇāya varadagurusakāśaṃ gacchatā priyabhāgineyena nītastatra bhāṣyaviṣaye
analyzed: śārīraka bhāṣya grahaṇāya vara da guru sakāśam gacchatā priya bhāgineyena nītaḥ tatra bhāṣya viṣaye

original: prasaktān bahūn saṃdehaśṛṅkhalāgranthīn visraṃsayaṃstayā tatrasamavetayā prajñāvṛddhapariṣadā
analyzed: prasaktān bahūn saṃdeha śṛṅkhalā granthīn visraṃsayan tayā tatra samavetayā prajñā vṛddha pariṣadā
apūrva prasāda vismaya citrita cittayā sa bahu mānam avalokitaḥ śrīmatā ca varada guruṇā
śrī bhagavat rāmānuja siddhāntasya daivāt saṃprati saṃjātam avalambanam iti baddha āśvāsena
bhūyāḥ traividya mānyaḥ tvam bhūri kalyāṇa bhājanam

original: ' ityāśiṣaṃ prayuñjānena 'asya kumārasya svataḥ pratibhātasamastaśāstrārthasārasya vidyāsaṃskāramātraphalo gurūpadeśo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: iti āśiṣam prayuñjānena asya kumārasya svatas pratibhāta samasta śāstra artha sārasya vidyā saṃskāra mātra phalaḥ guru upadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na tu jñāne kaścidapi śaktileśa ādheyo bhavati /
analyzed: na tu jñāne kaścid api śakti leśaḥ ādheyaḥ bhavati

original: bhagavānapi hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyāgrahaṇāya sāṃdīpinerācāryasya sakāśe gurukulavāsamagrahīt /
analyzed: bhagavān api hi devakīnandanaḥ vidyā grahaṇāya sāṃdīpineḥ ācāryasya sakāśe guru kula vāsam agrahīt

original: kiṃ cāsya śaiśava evāyaṃ prajñāprakarṣo dāśaratheriva vikramatiśayo janmasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca asya śaiśavaḥ eva ayam prajñā prakarṣaḥ dāśaratheḥ iva vikrama atiśayaḥ janma siddhaḥ
na asau puruṣa antara dṛṣṭi viṣayam prāpayitum yuktam

original: sābhyasūyāḥ savismāyā vā dṛśo nāsmin bālavayasi patitumarhanti /
analyzed: sa abhyasūyāḥ sa vismāyāḥ vā dṛśaḥ na asmin bāla vayasi patitum arhanti

original: dṛṣṭidoṣairhi viṣānalairiva prasaradbhistarava ivāvalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahāguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ svaguṇairlokamanupakṛtyaivāstaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi doṣaiḥ hi viṣa analaiḥ iva prasaradbhiḥ taravaḥ iva avalāḍhāḥ kati nāma mahā guṇāḥ puruṣāḥ sva guṇaiḥ lokam an upakṛtya eva astam gatāḥ
bhavān eva amum sarva śāstreṣu kṛtaprajñam kartum arhati

original: śrībhagavadrāmānujasiddhāntasyaiṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām' iyādiśya śiśurasau nijamātule vādihaṃsāmbudācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śrī bhagavat rāmānuja siddhāntasya eṣa jayadhvajaḥ samucchrīyatām iya ādiśya śiśuḥ asau nija mātule vādi haṃsa ambuda ācārye nyāsīkṛtaḥ

original: athāsau vayasā viṃśativarṣadeśīya eva san sarvatomukhaprasṛtaprabodhatayā pareṣāmanabhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
analyzed: atha asau vayasā viṃśati varṣa deśīyaḥ eva san sarvatomukha prasṛta prabodha tayā pareṣām an abhibhavanīyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ

original: evamakṣayyapratibhādraviṇena sarveṣvapi ca tantreṣu nirāmayaṃ panthānamavagantuṃ
analyzed: evam akṣayya pratibhā draviṇena sarveṣu api ca tantreṣu nirāmayam panthānam avagantum

original: prasādayituṃ cālaṅkarmīṇena cācāryeṇā sārdhaṃ kadācit kāñcīnagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ
analyzed: prasādayitum ca alaṅkarmīṇena ca ācāryeṇa sārdham kadācid kāñcī nagare devadevasya bhagavataḥ
śrī devarājasya vaiśākha māsike yātrā mahā utsave vidvat saṃvāda kutūhali tayā samāgataḥ
sarva pathīna vaiduṣī vibhavaḥ prabandha ratna praṇetā ca akhila śāstreṣu vidyāraṇyaḥ iti

original: kṛtapraśastināmadheyo mādhavācāryo nāma vedabhāṣyakṛt vādāhave lagno niraṅkuśaniśitatarkaśarāsāravarṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: kṛta praśasti nāmadheyaḥ mādhavācāryaḥ nāma veda bhāṣya kṛt vāda āhave lagnaḥ niraṅkuśa niśita tarka śara āsāra varṣiṇaḥ
ācāryasya agratas pratyavasthātum akṣamaḥ vismaya bahu māna bharita manāḥ vijaya nagaram prayātaḥ
sva śiṣyasya rājñaḥ tam artham yathāvṛttam āvedya tathāvidha vidvas ratna darśana utkaṇṭhā tvaritasya
prabhoḥ prārthanayā chatra cāmara prabhṛti samasta rāja paribarha paribṛṃhitam rāja aupavāhya puraḥsaram
pradhāna saciva hasta arpita sa bahu māna samāhvāna lekham ca catur aṅga balam
vairāgya pañcakam tasya pratyuttarayāñcakāra

original: tena ca mādhavācāryeṇa svīye sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanamupakṣipatā--- 'taduktaṃ veṅkaṭanāthena tattvamuktākakalāpe' ityupakramya,  #
analyzed: tena ca mādhava ācāryeṇa svīye sarva darśana saṃgrahe rāmānuja darśanam upakṣipatā 'tat uktam veṅkaṭanāthena tattvamuktākakalāpe iti upakramya
śrīḥ
śrīmate hayavadana para brahmaṇe namaḥ
śrīmate rāmānujāya namaḥ
śrīmate nigama anta mahā deśikāya namaḥ
vedānta ācārya varyaḥ me saṃnidhattām sadā hṛdi
